plot outline: Two friends Premkumar and Kalabhavan Mani set out into the city to make it big. They loose their initial jobs and decide to go into the real estate business. A mysterious girl comes into their lives , which marks the start of good fortune , and success of their business and changes their lives forever.
title: Excuse Me Ethu Collegila
plot: Two friends Premkumar and Kalabhavan Mani set out into the city to make it big. They loose their initial jobs and decide to go into the real estate business. A mysterious girl comes into their lives , which marks the start of good fortune , and success of their business and changes their lives forever.::Jojo Mathews
